title: Wrangell - St Elias National Park & Preserve: Shuttle Companies
body: Shuttle Companies         The Kuskulana Bridge is a highlight along the McCarthy Road   Shuttles From Anchorage Interior Alaska Bus Line (800) 770-6652 This company runs a bus from Anchorage to Tok, with multiple stops along the way, including Glennallen. Contact them for schedules. Soaring Eagle Transit (907) 822-4545 This shuttle service takes people from Anchorage to Glennallen and Valdez. Contact them for a schedule. Wrangell-St. Elias Tours (907) 960-2020 This shuttle service takes people from Anchorage to Glennallen and McCarthy. Contact them for a schedule. Shuttles Along The McCarthy Road The following companies provide regularly scheduled transportation service along the McCarthy Road (summer only). Kennicott Shuttle (907) 822-5292 Wrangell-St. Elias Tours (907) 960-2020 Wrangell Mountain Air (800) 478-1160 Provides daily flight service from Chitina to McCarthy, Alaska. (summer only)  These listings are provided as a service to our visitors and imply no specific endorsement by the National Park Service or Wrangell-St. Elias National Park and Preserve.
